outputs.output_descr: The purpose of this initiation plan (IP) is to develop and test a comprehensive framework of engagement with the Office of Ombudsperson in Ukraine in order to: (a) increase the capacities of the institution in monitoring and addressing human rights violations as per key recommendations of the capacity assessment study conducted by UNDP Ukraine in July 2012; (b) strengthen capacities of the newly created Department on the National Preventive Mechanism, (c) foster access to and linkages with regional peers. This IP will result in the development of a full-fledged project document on comprehensive intervention in the area of the OO capacity building

project_descr: Support to the Office of the Ombudsperson in Ukraine
project_title: Support to the Office of the Ombudsperson in Ukraine
